malaria.MALARIA_EST_INCIDENCE: Estimated malaria incidence (per 1000 population at risk)

hiv.HIV_0000000001: Estimated number of people (all ages) living with HIV
hiv.HIV_0000000006: Number of people dying from HIV-related causes

tb.MDG_0000000020: Incidence of tuberculosis (per 100 000 population per year)
tb.MDG_0000000017: Deaths due to tuberculosis among HIV-negative people (per 100 000 population)
tb.TB_e_mort_exc_tbhiv_num: Number of deaths due to tuberculosis, excluding HIV

cholera.CHOLERA_0000000002: Number of reported deaths from cholera
cholera.CHOLERA_0000000001: Number of reported cases of cholera
